comments:
Build 20020920 (M1)

When I press the "Synchronize all CVS projects with their repositories" 
button, I get an NPE. I used the button yesterday with the same workspace 
and had no problems. Today I get an NPE everytime. Here's the stack trace:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Sep 26, 2002 08:44:33.229
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

Code))

The NPE occurs because of the current selection (i.e. we should ignore it but 
we didn't). Select a CVS project and the command should work.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23758 ***
